headline: The Latest Dilemma Facing Finance Chiefs: What to Tell Investors About Tariffs
summary: CFOs are weighing how much information to share about the impact of tariffs, especially as many are yet to take effect and the landscape continues to evolve.

headline: Tapestry Stock Looks Strong After Shoe Sale. Coach Bags Are Still Popular.
summary: After the sale of the Stuart Weitzman brand, it makes sense for Tapestry to focus on Coach, which has been a standout in the affordable-luxury handbag market.
